thread.section_title: Futonland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Futonland | futonland.com
thread.title: Karen Mitchell

author: Karen Mitchell
title: Karen Mitchell
text:
I am extremely happy with the quality of the Chenille material, high grade of sewing , colors of the fabrics and custom fit based on my description of my futon mattress. It is a decorators show piece . It makes the futon itself much more chic. Had it ordered , made and delivered to my door within 48 hours. Packaged like it came from a high class department store. High Tech quality coupled with good old fashion personal service.
The personnel I dealt with both on my e mail chat and phone call were first rate professionals. The service was flawless. They had time for me, were knowledgeable, made perfect suggestions and stream lined the process.
I only wish our US Government could run with such professionalism , as Futonland.
